hero-subtitle: Safe, reliable transportation at your fingertips. Connect with trusted drivers or join as a driver today.
passengers-feature-desc: Book reliable transportation, track your ride in real-time, and manage family members' trips.
drivers-feature-desc: Earn money driving, manage your routes, and grow your transportation business.
organizations-feature-desc: Manage fleet operations, track driver performance, and ensure safe transportation.
get-started-desc: Join us and start using Find Your Ride for your transportation needs.
about-lead: Connecting families, drivers, and organizations for safe, reliable transportation across all sectors - from school runs to business commutes, medical appointments to special events.
about-vision: We're building a comprehensive transportation ecosystem that serves everyone - from parents seeking safe school transport to businesses managing employee commutes, and from independent drivers growing their business to organizations optimizing their fleet operations.
about-cta: Join us and start using Find Your Ride for your transportation needs. Download the app to access live routes, real-time tracking, and secure payments.
privacy-desc: Privacy Policy for Find Your Ride - Learn how we protect your data and privacy.
privacy-intro: This Privacy Policy explains how Find Your Ride collects, uses, and protects your information when you use our transportation marketplace platform.
data-sharing-intro: We share your information only in the following circumstances:
user-rights-intro: You have the following rights regarding your personal data:
rights-contact: To exercise these rights, contact us at support@findyouride.com
children-privacy-text: Our service is designed for users 13 years and older. For users under 18, parental consent is required. We implement special protections for minors and comply with COPPA requirements for children under 13 who may use our service through family accounts.
data-retention-text: We retain your personal data for as long as necessary to provide our services and comply with legal obligations. Trip data is typically retained for 7 years for legal and safety purposes, while profile data is retained while your account is active plus 3 years after deactivation.
policy-updates-text: We may update this Privacy Policy from time to time. We will notify you of significant changes via email or app notification. Continued use of our service after changes constitutes acceptance of the updated policy.
contact-intro: For privacy-related questions or concerns, contact us:
contact-note: We will respond to privacy requests within 30 days.
personal-info-li-1: Name, email address, and phone number
location-info-li-1: GPS coordinates for route optimization and tracking
data-usage-li-1: Service Provision: To connect passengers with drivers and facilitate transportation services
data-usage-li-2: Safety & Security: To verify identities, conduct background checks, and ensure platform safety
data-usage-li-3: Communication: To send notifications about rides, updates, and important announcements
data-usage-li-4: Improvement: To analyze usage patterns and improve our platform
data-usage-li-5: Legal Compliance: To comply with applicable laws and regulations
data-sharing-para: We respect that passenger and dependent information is personal and belongs to the passenger (or the passenger's account owner). We do not sell or otherwise provide passenger personal data to third parties for their independent use. We share data only in limited circumstances and only to the extent necessary to provide the service or to comply with legal obligations.
data-sharing-li-1: With Drivers (minimal trip data): We share only the information necessary for a driver to complete a booked trip.
data-sharing-li-2: With Organizations: When you book through an organization's transportation service, we may share trip-related information to support coordination and reporting.
data-sharing-li-3: Service Providers: Trusted third parties who provide services like mapping, notifications, analytics, and cloud storage.
data-sharing-li-4: Legal Requirements: We disclose personal data when required by law or to protect user safety.
third-party-intro: Our platform integrates with the following third-party services: Google Maps (location), Firebase (push notifications), Google Analytics (usage analytics), and AWS (cloud storage).
data-security-intro: We implement comprehensive security measures, including encryption, access controls, and regular audits to protect your data.
user-rights-li-1: Access: Request copies of your personal data
user-rights-li-2: Correction: Update or correct inaccurate information
user-rights-li-3: Deletion: Request deletion of your personal data
user-rights-li-4: Portability: Request transfer of your data to another service
user-rights-li-5: Objection: Object to certain uses of your data
user-rights-li-6: Restriction: Request limitation of data processing
privacy-children-para: Our service is designed for users 13 years and older. For users under 18, parental consent is required.
privacy-data-retention-para: We retain your personal data for as long as necessary to provide our services and comply with legal obligations.
privacy-policy-updates-para: We may update this Privacy Policy from time to time. Continued use of our service after changes constitutes acceptance of the updated policy.
terms-acceptance-para: By accessing or using the platform, you confirm that you have read, understood, and agree to be bound by these Terms of Service and our Privacy Policy.
terms-use-para: The platform connects passengers with drivers for transportation services. You agree to use the service only for lawful purposes and not to misuse the platform or interfere with its operation.
terms-accounts-para: You are responsible for maintaining the confidentiality of your account credentials and for all activity that occurs under your account. Notify us immediately if you suspect unauthorized access.
terms-payments-para: When payment features are available, you agree to pay any fees associated with transactions made through the platform. Specific payment terms will be presented when payment processing is enabled.
terms-user-conduct-para: Users must behave respectfully. Harassment, fraud, illegal activity, or any behavior that endangers others is prohibited. Violations may result in account suspension or termination.
terms-termination-para: We may suspend or terminate access to the platform for users who violate these terms or for operational reasons. You may also close your account at any time.
terms-disclaimer-para: The platform is provided "as is" without warranties. To the fullest extent permitted by law, Find Your Ride is not liable for indirect, incidental, or consequential damages arising from your use of the service.
terms-changes-para: We may update these Terms from time to time. We will notify users of significant changes. Continued use after changes constitutes acceptance.
